comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: The Burgess Model H was an early United States airplane and one of the first air machines specifically designed and built for military use. Classified as the "Model H military tractor", it was developed and built in 1912 by Burgess Company and Curtis, which in 1914 became the Burgess Company. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burgess_Model_H
